name: Corruptor
description:
A 2D platformer where everything falls apart. Made for the 7 Day Buggy Jam.

Use WASD/arrow keys/numpad to move. Hold shift to run. Every time the clock ticks, something is corrupted. Collect hourglasses to reset the clock's speed and gain score. See if you can collect all 9 hourglasses in each level.

The Godot project files are hosted on GitHub under the MIT license. You can find the attribution information in README.md.
